regular-body:
1. If something sucks, fix it (this basic yet important rule is reflected in many common Wikipedia attitudes, such as Be Bold and Template:Sofixit)
  2. Small is beautiful (Ockham’s Razor follows)
  3. Be positive, not negative
  • â¦or karma will catch up to you
  • â¦because life is not a zero-sum game
  • Anything worth doing is worth doing right (don’t do anything halfway)
  • Don’t take any guff from these fucking swine (it only encourages them)
  • Never whistle while you’re pissing (only do as much as you can focus on)
  • Good enough is good enough (don’t obsess)
  • Know your enemy
    • â¦and they’re all your enemy
  • Once you’re in love you’re pretty much fucked
    • – Foobaz, a Wikipedian
